TopicTitle: where can we find replacements/ updated mods like ksp wheel and rasp prop break "breaking grounds" dlc or will there be no updates to them

Articles.Content:
if you all can tell me where we can find the fixes of if someone can make a fix for ksp wheel mainly (i love using kerbal founderies but it needs ksp wheel) dm me at discord if you do have a mod that fixes this or you made one

jdpop#9874

https://github.com/shadowmage45/KSPWheel/blob/dev/GameData/KSPWheel/Plugin/KSPWheel.dll?raw=true

This updated .dll will allow the latest KSPWheel to function on 1.8. Overwrite the existing one in your GameData/KSPWheel/
